languages.text: "Скорее помогает скрыться. Они прячут свою ересь за привычной окружающим ширмой. Еще один культ, мало ли их... К тому же, возможно они действительно видят свое нечестивое божество таким. Допросы показывали, что они воспринимали своих уродливых хозяев-ксеносов как нечто прекрасное. Чудовища кажутся им ангелами, а почитатели Императора — еретиками".

"The more likely reason is that it helps them blend in. They hide their heresy behind the veil of normality. Just one more cult like so many others. Moreover, it is possible that they indeed see their deity that way. Such cultists have been known to describe their grotesque xenos masters as beautiful during interrogations. Monsters are angels to them, and the God-Emperor's worshippers are heretics."
languages.original_text: "Скорее помогает скрыться. Они прячут свою ересь за привычной окружающим ширмой. Еще один культ, мало ли их... К тому же, возможно они действительно видят свое нечестивое божество таким. Допросы показывали, что они воспринимали своих уродливых хозяев-ксеносов как нечто прекрасное. Чудовища кажутся им ангелами, а почитатели Императора — еретиками".

languages.text: “更有可能的原因是，这样的说法有助于帮助他们融入社会。他们会将异端邪说隐藏在正常的信仰面纱后面，就像其他邪教一样。除此之外，他们可能确实就是这么看待他们的神明。众所周知，在审讯的过程中，这些邪教成员会用‘美丽’这个词来形容他们怪诞的异形主人。对他们而言，那些怪物才是天使，而崇拜神皇的信徒才是异端分子。”
languages.original_text: "The more likely reason is that it helps them blend in. They hide their heresy behind the veil of normality. Just one more cult like so many others. Moreover, it is possible that they indeed see their deity that way. Such cultists have been known to describe their grotesque xenos masters as beautiful during interrogations. Monsters are angels to them, and the God-Emperor's worshippers are heretics."

traits.locale_text: “更有可能的原因是，这样的说法有助于帮助他们融入社会。他们会将异端邪说隐藏在正常的信仰面纱后面，就像其他邪教一样。除此之外，他们可能确实就是这么看待他们的神明。众所周知，在审讯的过程中，这些邪教成员会用‘美丽’这个词来形容他们怪诞的异形主人。对他们而言，那些怪物才是天使，而崇拜神皇的信徒才是异端分子。”

languages.text: «Lo más probable es que les ayude a confundirse entre la población. Ocultan su herejía tras un velo de normalidad, como si fueran otro culto más entre tantos. Es más, cabe la posibilidad de que vean a su deidad de ese modo. Muchos de estos cultistas describen a sus grotescos amos xenos como seres de gran belleza durante sus interrogatorios. Esos monstruos son como ángeles para ellos, y consideran herejes a los adoradores del Dios Emperador».
languages.original_text: "The more likely reason is that it helps them blend in. They hide their heresy behind the veil of normality. Just one more cult like so many others. Moreover, it is possible that they indeed see their deity that way. Such cultists have been known to describe their grotesque xenos masters as beautiful during interrogations. Monsters are angels to them, and the God-Emperor's worshippers are heretics."

traits.locale_text: «Lo más probable es que les ayude a confundirse entre la población. Ocultan su herejía tras un velo de normalidad, como si fueran otro culto más entre tantos. Es más, cabe la posibilidad de que vean a su deidad de ese modo. Muchos de estos cultistas describen a sus grotescos amos xenos como seres de gran belleza durante sus interrogatorios. Esos monstruos son como ángeles para ellos, y consideran herejes a los adoradores del Dios Emperador».

languages.text: 「もっともそうな理由なら、彼らが紛れ込むのに役立ちます。彼らは異端を日常のベールに隠していますから。他の多くのカルトと同じ、単なるカルトの１つにすぎません。さらに、彼らが自分たちの神をそのように見ている可能性もあります。そのような魔女団たちは、尋問の際にグロテスクな異種族の主人を美しいと表現することで知られています。彼らにとっての怪物は天使であり、神帝陛下は異端なのです」
languages.original_text: "The more likely reason is that it helps them blend in. They hide their heresy behind the veil of normality. Just one more cult like so many others. Moreover, it is possible that they indeed see their deity that way. Such cultists have been known to describe their grotesque xenos masters as beautiful during interrogations. Monsters are angels to them, and the God-Emperor's worshippers are heretics."

traits.locale_text: 「もっともそうな理由なら、彼らが紛れ込むのに役立ちます。彼らは異端を日常のベールに隠していますから。他の多くのカルトと同じ、単なるカルトの１つにすぎません。さらに、彼らが自分たちの神をそのように見ている可能性もあります。そのような魔女団たちは、尋問の際にグロテスクな異種族の主人を美しいと表現することで知られています。彼らにとっての怪物は天使であり、神帝陛下は異端なのです」

languages.text: "Es hilft ihnen eher, einzusickern. Sie verbergen ihre Ketzerei hinter dem Schleier der Normalität. Ein Kult wie viele andere. Es wäre allerdings möglich, dass sie ihre Gottheit tatsächlich so sehen. Derartige Kultisten beschreiben ihre grotesken Xenos-Meister bei Verhören nicht selten als wunderschöne Wesen. Monster sind für sie Engel und die Gefolgsleute des Gottimperators Ketzer."
languages.original_text: "The more likely reason is that it helps them blend in. They hide their heresy behind the veil of normality. Just one more cult like so many others. Moreover, it is possible that they indeed see their deity that way. Such cultists have been known to describe their grotesque xenos masters as beautiful during interrogations. Monsters are angels to them, and the God-Emperor's worshippers are heretics."

traits.locale_text: "Es hilft ihnen eher, einzusickern. Sie verbergen ihre Ketzerei hinter dem Schleier der Normalität. Ein Kult wie viele andere. Es wäre allerdings möglich, dass sie ihre Gottheit tatsächlich so sehen. Derartige Kultisten beschreiben ihre grotesken Xenos-Meister bei Verhören nicht selten als wunderschöne Wesen. Monster sind für sie Engel und die Gefolgsleute des Gottimperators Ketzer."

languages.text: « Probablement parce que ça leur permet de se fondre dans la masse. Ils dissimulent ainsi leur hérésie derrière un vernis de normalité, tel un énième culte parmi tant d'autres. En outre, il n'est pas exclu qu'ils voient vraiment leur divinité ainsi. Ce ne serait pas la première fois qu'un fanatique de leur acabit décrirait ses affreux maîtres xénos comme des parangons de beauté. À leurs yeux, ces monstres sont des anges, et les fidèles de l'Empereur-Dieu des hérétiques notoires. »
languages.original_text: "The more likely reason is that it helps them blend in. They hide their heresy behind the veil of normality. Just one more cult like so many others. Moreover, it is possible that they indeed see their deity that way. Such cultists have been known to describe their grotesque xenos masters as beautiful during interrogations. Monsters are angels to them, and the God-Emperor's worshippers are heretics."

traits.locale_text: « Probablement parce que ça leur permet de se fondre dans la masse. Ils dissimulent ainsi leur hérésie derrière un vernis de normalité, tel un énième culte parmi tant d'autres. En outre, il n'est pas exclu qu'ils voient vraiment leur divinité ainsi. Ce ne serait pas la première fois qu'un fanatique de leur acabit décrirait ses affreux maîtres xénos comme des parangons de beauté. À leurs yeux, ces monstres sont des anges, et les fidèles de l'Empereur-Dieu des hérétiques notoires. »

languages.text: "Daha olası nedeni ise ortama uyum sağlamalarına yardımcı olmasıdır. Kâfirliklerini normallik örtüsünün ardında gizlerler. Nice tarikat arasından biri daha işte. Dahası, ilahlarını bu şekilde görmeleri gerçekten de mümkün. Böylesi tarikatçıların sorgular esnasında grotesk zeno efendilerini güzel olarak betimlediklerine denk gelmiştik. Onların gözünde canavarlar meleklerden, İmparator'un müritleri ise kâfirlerden ibaret."
languages.original_text: "The more likely reason is that it helps them blend in. They hide their heresy behind the veil of normality. Just one more cult like so many others. Moreover, it is possible that they indeed see their deity that way. Such cultists have been known to describe their grotesque xenos masters as beautiful during interrogations. Monsters are angels to them, and the God-Emperor's worshippers are heretics."
